text: فَأَمَّا ٱلَّذِينَ شَقُوا۟ فَفِى ٱلنَّارِ لَهُمْ فِيهَا زَفِيرٌ وَشَهِيقٌ

translation.en.sahih: As for those who were [destined to be] wretched, they will be in the Fire. For them therein is [violent] exhaling and inhaling.
translation.id.indonesian: Adapun orang-orang yang celaka, maka (tempatnya) di dalam neraka, di dalamnya mereka mengeluarkan dan menarik nafas (dengan merintih),
